definition: to drive/to propel/drive (vehicle wheel)/drive mechanism (tape or disk)/device driver (computing software)
to expel/to urge on/to drive/to run quickly
(of sth) to move/to set in movement/to displace/to touch/to make use of/to stir (emotions)/to alter/abbr. for 動詞|动词[dong4 ci2], verb
CD or DVD drive/abbr. to 光驅|光驱

pinyin: gai4 nian4 qu1 dong4 jia1 gong1

sentences.english: More dramatic is the introduction of goal-driven search engine marketing campaigns.
sentences.chinese: 更戏剧性的是，目标驱动的搜索引擎营销活动的介绍。

sentences.english: We must first calculate the horse-power needed to propel the ship.
sentences.chinese: 我们必须首先计算出驱动这艘船需要多大马力。

sentences.english: Air whips past the blades of a turbine, forcing it to spin.
sentences.chinese: 经过风轮叶片的空气迫使风轮旋转，风轮驱动电机。

sentences.english: Touchscreens are generally considered the next step in HIDD human driven interfaces.
sentences.chinese: 触摸屏一般被认为是下一步HIDD人力驱动接口。

sentences.english: The piston-rods connect the pistons to the parts of the engine which they move.
sentences.chinese: 活塞杆把活塞和引擎中被活塞驱动的部件连在一起。

sentences.english: Don't push the face down, but use the body to drive the head forward.
sentences.chinese: 别推下来，但使用面对身体来驱动头向前。

sentences.english: See publication AV-4, Actuated Thermoplastic Valves, for detailed information.
sentences.chinese: 参阅“执行机构驱动热塑性阀门”，了解详细资料。

sentences.english: Thekeydriver behind the increase will come from basic set-top boxes.
sentences.chinese: 增长背后的主要驱动力来自于基础机顶盒市场。

sentences.english: Finally, actuated the system to the car to carry on the innovation.
sentences.chinese: 对小车驱动系统进行了革新。

sentences.english: Fully populated each Barge drive bay contains 96 drives.
sentences.chinese: 完全稀疏的每只平底船开湾包括96个驱动器。

sentences.english: Constitutional Affairs, Ford F150 2004 Super four-wheel drive.
sentences.chinese: 政制事务局2004年福特F150超级四轮驱动。

sentences.english: Revenue and Margin Driver Suppliers take actions that go much further than improving supply chain efficiencies, reactively or proactively.
sentences.chinese: 收入和边际利润驱动厂商对供应链的变革更进一步。

sentences.english: Ocean waves move the hydraulic fluid, which spins the generator.
sentences.chinese: 海浪推动液压油从而驱动发电机运转。

sentences.english: A new control system of electric door was introduced in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 介绍中了一种新型电动门驱动及控制系统。

sentences.english: The information-driven sensor selection is simulated in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 论文对信息驱动的节点选择机制进行了仿真。

definition: to push (for acceptance of a plan)/to push forward/to promote/to actuate/CL:個|个[ge4]
to work/to operate/to revolve/to turn around
to crane one's neck/to await eagerly/to lead/to show the way
